title: Dead On My Feet
description: Librarian note: alternative-cover edition of B007ET2XI2."A relentless, thrill-a-minute joy ride through the haunted house that is post-apocalyptic America."After escaping from zombie-infested New York, Chris Collins travels across the devastated ruins of post-apocalyptic America in search of his daughter.The zombies rule the cities, but they are by no means the only threat. Standing in his way are cannibalistic, slave-trading motorcycle gangs, crazed 'Resurrection Men,' and 'Corporation Agents' who want information he doesn't have.Throw in a psychotic wannabe gunslinger, a zombie super-model, the inmates of a bizarre 'zombie zoo', and a psychopath who gets his kicks throwing people from skyscrapers and you have a rip-roaring adventure with more twists and turns than a coiled rattlesnake.
author: J.J. Zep
